content: अतिरिक्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Surpassed, excelled; सर्वातिरिक्तसारेण <ls>R. 1. 14</ls> strength exceeding that of all creatures; सुतजन्मातिरिक्तेन महोत्सवेन <ls>K. 137</ls> surpassing the birth of a son. {@--2@} Redundant, superfluous, remaining over and above; परिपूरितहृदयातिरिक्तहर्षमिव <ls>K. 66</ls> not contained in the heart. {@--3@} Excessive, exuberant. {@--4@} Unequalled, unsurpassed; supreme, elevated; समश्नुवानाः सहसाऽतिरिक्ततां <ls>Ki. 14. 33</ls> being raised up or elevated. {@--5@} Different (generally व्यतिरिक्त in this sense, <ab>q. v.</ab>). {@--6@} Quite empty.
